title: CY50107: Reagents In Chemical Analysis - Quick Facts
text:
CY50107
Course name | Reagents In Chemical Analysis
Offered by | Chemistry
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NilThe role of organic, in particular, complex-forming, reagents in the formation and development of gravimetric, volumetric (including complexometric) and spectrophotometric analysis. The prospects for the use of organic reagents (tailor made) in modern analytical methods; focus on the modified and immobilised reagents, receptor molecules and on the use of nonaqueous and organised media. Liquid-Phase Oxidation of Organic Reagents in Inorganic Analysis
